contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be translated in active form. Alternate translation: "will certainly punish you" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-doublenegatives]])
contextId.glQuote: will certainly not leave you unpunished

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in positive form. Alternate translation: "will certainly punish you" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-doublenegatives]])
contextId.glQuote: will certainly not leave you unpunished

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in positive form. Alternate translation: "I will scatter the people of Elam to every nation on earth" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-doublenegatives]])
contextId.glQuote: There is no nation to which those scattered from Elam will not go
